# cmccloudv2_autoscaling_delete_policy (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create delete policy
resource "cmccloudv2_autoscaling_delete_policy" "delete_policy1" {  
    name                    = "as_group1_delete_policy"
    criteria                = "OLDEST_FIRST"
    grace_period            = 60
    destroy_after_deletion  = true
    reduce_desired_capacity = true
    lifecycle_hook_url      = ""
    lifecycle_timeout       = 3600
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `criteria` (String) The criteria of the autoscaling delete policy
- `name` (String) The name of the autoscaling delete policy

### Optional

- `destroy_after_deletion` (Boolean) The destroy after deletion of the autoscaling delete policy
- `grace_period` (Number) The grace period of the autoscaling delete policy
- `lifecycle_hook_url` (String) The lifecycle hook URL of the autoscaling delete policy
- `lifecycle_timeout` (Number) The lifecycle timeout of the autoscaling delete policy
- `reduce_desired_capacity` (Boolean) The reduce desired capacity of the autoscaling delete policy
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
